results.p: by CI Wade · 2023 · Cited by 6 — The definition of the human abdomen is the anterior region of the trunk between the thoracic diaphragm superiorly and the pelvic brim inferiorly.

results.t: Definition of abdomen - NCI Dictionary of Cancer Terms
results.p: (AB-doh-men) The area of the body that contains the pancreas, stomach, intestines, liver, gallbladder, and other organs.
